ModMetaData.name: [KV] Save Storage, Outfit, Crafting, Drug, & Operation Settings - 1.0
ModMetaData.author: Kiame Vivacity
ModMetaData.description:
Save and Load Dump/Stockpile and Outfit settings. These saves can be carried over from new games to old saves.
Future Plans: Add support for other types of Storage Zones.
Changes: Stockpiles: - Save Priorities. - Save Colors (Might be undesired, unless the mod to change the colors is installed).
Food restrictions: - Can save and load just like outfits.
Bills: - Count Equipped, count tainted, look in (stockpile), quality, only allowed ingredients, take to (stockpile), suspended now saved.
Dialog: - Saving textbar no longer overlaps the file list.
Translation: - German
Thank you to the translators: -Proxyer for Japanese
